name: 2D Shooter - Space Blaster (complete)
description:
This is my 2D Shooter project (cpmplete)

Completed Modifications:

1) New design for the main menu, including descriptive instructions and rule page with control and game rule descriptions.

2) New, more robust levels with increased difficulty and varying design.
